item.title: Internal Tech Radar - Data Analysis and Science
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop an AI-powered system that analyzes internal communications and documentation to automatically maintain and update an internal Tech Radar, providing insights into technology adoption, success patterns, and challenges within the organization.
